item.title: Share Music With Zoom
item.description: In the physical world, playing background music is easy. You just play it. Not so much in the virtual world. Fear not! I enlisted my eleven year old to help make a tutorial to demonstrate how to add music to a Zoom meeting. Step by step instructions: Start or Join the Zoom Meeting Click the “Share Screen” button on the menu A new window will open – Click the “Advanced” option Select “Music or Computer Sound Only” Hit “Share” Some Tech Details Applications like Zoom want to make sure the person speaking is heard.

item.title: About
item.description: This site features articles and tutorials to help spiritually minded folk understand technology. About the Author My name is Wendy. In 1998, I was a programming geek – that was fun! In 2008, I became a mom – that was really hard! In 2009, I was diagnosed with a rare cancer – that was much worse! A year later, I was physically, emotionally, and mentally broken. Determined to see my baby grow, I went on a quest to find health.
